review.reviewBody: Incredible value and amazing taste. I got the "Boneless Sweet & Sour Pork and Yang-Zhou Style Fried Rice" - cant recommend these guys  enough !

Totally recommend the D5. Beef Rolls / 牛肉卷餅 and V3. Spicy Salted Tofu / 椒鹽豆腐! The food was warm and fresh, love the tiny taste of the bbq sauce in the beef rolls which was just the right amount to not overpower other flavours.  Good quantity for price as well and the food was very well packed - which is important for food delivery purposes I think. Definitely will order from here again.
Big portion size, decent taste! Awesome packaging
In my opinion, this is the best Chinese food around, and my fave. Authentic and delicious, with quality ingredients.
Very greasy food that lacked flavour
